name: Netfective Technology
overview: Netfective Technology SA operates as a software vendor. It provides UML and MDA training; BLU AGE 2009 Edition, a MDA compliant software that enables automated transformation of UML application process into Java EE and .Net Enterprise business applications; BLU AGE ‘Build’ and ‘Deliver’ Modules, which allow setting up technical environments for source code generation; BLU AGE ‘Reverse Modeling’ Module that allows automatically extract UML models up from the source code of existing Java; and UML modeling tools to create, manipulate, and store models and metamodels. The company also offers professional services to support BLU AGE UML and MDA training, and consulting and product customization through specific cartridges and software development. In addition, Netfective Technology SA involves in the development of customized enterprise business applications, maintenance of MDA-based applications, modernization of legacy application, and industrialization of your agile developments. Further, it offers specialized microfinance for micro-entrepreneurs. Netfective Technology SA was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Suresnes, France with additional locations in Paris, Bordeaux, and Montrouge, France; Dover, Delaware; and Casablanca, Morocco.
